channel.title: Comments on: What are the latest trends in web design?

item.title: By: pjb

item.description: I have another comments I would like to add. Let's see how it looks!

item.title: By: pjb
item.dc:creator: pjb
item.description: So what are the latest trends in web design? I don't see where you've answered the question? And why aren't your font sizes consistent across posts?
item.content:encoded: So what are the latest trends in web design? I don’t see where you’ve answered the question? And why aren’t your font sizes consistent across posts?
